amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for REAL ID grants by $150 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce appropriation for the Coast Gaurd construction by $150,000,000, and increase the State and local terrorism prevention activities by $150,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bilbray amendment (A031) Failed by recorded vote: 155 - 268 (Roll no. 479).
